email.title: AMEXTECH (Inter) University Pub Quiz
email.text:
Looking for a fun event to cool off from classes? Or an activity for you Mums and Dads family?
American Express will be hosting an inter university pub quiz **on the 6th of November**. The challenge will be split into two rounds with the first one taking place next Wednesday at The Prince in West Brompton crossing Earls Court.
If you're looking to show off your trivia knowledge or just have some fun over a drink, **email scott.hardie1@aexp.com** to sign up your team of 4.
Need help finding a team? Why not go with your Mums and Dads family or ping us a quick email at docsoc@imperial.ac.uk and we'll match you to a team.
_This event is open to non-members._
email.heading: (Inter) University Challenge: Heats

event.location: The Prince Pub, 14 Lillie Road, West Brompton Crossing Earls Court, London, SW6 1TT
event.text:
One team from each participating university will WIN an ultimate Amex Experience from Brighton to London culminating in the Grand Final in London.
7 universities for all over the country will be competing for the chance to win an ultimate Amex Experience from Brighton to London and send a winning team to the Grand Final in London.
Email us with the name of your team & 4 team members by 05.11.19 at scott.hardie1@aexp.com.
Check the attached flyer for more information!
